privacy.section_1_p1: Welcome to Christian Platform ("Platform," "we," "us," or "our"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal information with care and respect.
privacy.section_1_p2: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Platform. Please read this policy carefully.
privacy.section_2_1_p1: We collect information you provide directly:
privacy.section_2_1_li1: Account Information: Name, email address, password
privacy.section_2_1_li2: Profile Information: Church affiliation, role (seeker, student, scholar, leader)
privacy.section_2_1_li3: User Content: Notes, saved content, study materials, questions asked to AI
privacy.section_2_1_li4: Communication: Messages sent through our support system
privacy.section_2_1_li5: Payment Information: Billing details (processed securely through third-party providers)
privacy.section_2_2_p1: When you use our Platform, we automatically collect:
privacy.section_2_2_li1: Usage Data: Features used, time spent, pages visited
privacy.section_2_2_li2: Device Information: Browser type, operating system, device identifiers
privacy.section_2_2_li3: Log Data: IP address, access times, error logs
privacy.section_2_2_li4: Cookies: Small data files stored on your device
privacy.section_2_3_p1: We collect questions, prompts, and responses from your interactions with our AI tools to improve service quality and personalize your experience.
privacy.section_3_li1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
privacy.section_3_li4: Personalize your experience and content recommendations
privacy.section_3_li5: Send important updates, newsletters, and educational content
privacy.section_3_li6: Respond to your questions and support requests
privacy.section_3_li7: Monitor and analyze usage patterns and trends
privacy.section_3_li8: Detect and prevent fraud, abuse, and security issues
privacy.section_3_li10: Improve AI model performance and accuracy
privacy.section_4_p1: We do NOT sell your personal information. We may share your information:
privacy.section_4_1_p1: We will share your information when you explicitly authorize us to do so.
privacy.section_4_2_p1: We work with third-party service providers who help us operate the Platform:
privacy.section_4_2_li3: AI Services: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and other LLM providers
privacy.section_4_2_li4: Payment Processing: Stripe or similar (when implemented)
privacy.section_4_2_li5: Analytics: Usage tracking and performance monitoring
privacy.section_4_3_p1: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to:
privacy.section_4_3_li3: Protection of our rights, property, or safety
privacy.section_4_3_li4: Protection of users or the public
privacy.section_4_4_p1: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.
privacy.section_5_p1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information:
privacy.section_5_p2: However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security but will notify you of any significant data breaches as required by law.
privacy.section_6_p1: We retain your information for as long as necessary to:
privacy.section_6_p2: When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal information within 30 days, except where we are required to retain it for legal purposes.
privacy.section_7_li1: Access: Request a copy of your personal information
privacy.section_7_li2: Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information
privacy.section_7_li3: Deletion: Request deletion of your account and data
privacy.section_7_li4: Portability: Receive your data in a portable format
privacy.section_7_li7: Object: Object to certain types of processing
privacy.section_7_p2: To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@christianplatform.com
privacy.section_8_p1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to:
privacy.section_8_li3: Understand how you use our Platform
privacy.section_8_p2: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may limit Platform functionality.
privacy.section_9_p1: Our Platform is designed for users aged 13 and older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacy.section_9_p2: For users aged 13-18, we recommend parental guidance and involvement. Churches and organizations using our Platform for youth ministry should ensure appropriate supervision.
privacy.section_10_p1: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable law.
privacy.section_11_p1: Our Platform may contain links to third-party websites and services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to read their privacy policies.
privacy.section_12_p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through the Platform. The "Last Updated" date will always reflect the most recent version.
privacy.section_13_p1: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices:
privacy.section_14_p1: If you are in the European Union, you have additional rights under GDPR:
privacy.section_14_li1: Right to be informed about data processing
privacy.section_14_li3: Right to object to automated decision-making
privacy.section_14_li4: Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority
privacy.section_14_p2: We process your data based on your consent, contractual necessity, legal obligations, and our legitimate interests in providing and improving our services.
privacy.stewardship_quote: "So then, each of us will give an account of ourselves to God." - Romans 14:12
privacy.stewardship_text: We recognize that your information is entrusted to us, and we take this stewardship seriously. We are committed to handling your data with integrity, transparency, and respect, as unto the Lord.

pitch.hero_slide_1_title: Baptisted by Internet, Social Media and AI
pitch.hero_slide_1_subtitle: We consume 'shadow knowledge' enjoyed being a know-thing 'shadow' believer
pitch.hero_slide_1_highlight: We Know Almost Everything But Experience Few
pitch.hero_slide_2_subtitle: You have a sketch of knowing the thing, you never know the details, you do not have fulfiment and frustration in experiencing
pitch.hero_slide_3_subtitle: From knowing about God to truely experience Him together
pitch.discover_button: Discover our Vision, Explore More Practical Tools for Modern Christian Living
pitch.hero_subtitle:
From knowing about God
to truly knowing Him together.
pitch.crisis_subtitle:
Many know about God, but don't truly know Him.
We bridge the gap from passive knowledge to active, shared faith.
pitch.danger_point_1: Creates a false sense of maturity
pitch.danger_point_2: Puts passive knowledge over active faith
pitch.danger_point_4: Leads to a lack of genuine relationship with Christ
pitch.solution_title:
Our Vision: A Living Walk,
Not a Program
pitch.solution_subtitle: We nurture a genuine walk with God: from knowledge, to practice, to shared experience.
pitch.features_subtitle: Guiding users from cultural curiosity to genuine discipleship.
pitch.step_1_content: Engage with beautiful art, music, and history as a non-threatening entry point.
pitch.step_2_content: Shift focus from "what" to "why" to spark deeper, reflective thought.
pitch.step_3_content: Optional prompts connect truths to personal life, bridging knowledge and experience.
pitch.step_4_content: Users naturally click their way from aesthetics to doctrine.
pitch.step_5_content: Each topic has levels: Surface, Intermediate, and Deep. Users choose their depth.
pitch.step_6_content: Quizzes and spaced repetition ensure users actively learn and retain core truths.
pitch.step_7_content: Users discuss what they're learning, asking real questions to solidify understanding.
pitch.step_8_content: Follow-ups on personal application goals provide encouragement to turn intention into action.
pitch.choice_subtitle: The choice: Build for audience size, or for life-changing depth.
pitch.closing_quote: "Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men."
pitch.next_step_1: Discuss & commit to building for depth over numbers.
pitch.next_step_2: Decide to prioritize transformation over vanity metrics.
pitch.next_step_3: Identify and empower a developer (volunteer or hired).
pitch.next_step_4: Pray for the wisdom and courage to build what truly honors God.
pitch.closing_message: Together, we can make disciples who truly know God.
